firstGlance.title: Comfortable and Safe Airport Transfer Services in Paris

Services.title: Paris'te Özel Şoförlü VIP Ulaşım ve Gezi Hizmetleri
Services.description: Paris'te lüks ulaşım deneyimi mi arıyorsunuz? Havalimanı transferlerinden özel şehir turlarına kadar, profesyonel şoförlü araç hizmetimizle Paris'te konfor, güvenlik ve prestiji bir arada sunuyoruz.
Services.p1: Paris Charles de Gaulle (CDG), Orly (ORY) ve Beauvais (BVA) havalimanlarından sizi karşılıyor ve otelinize, iş toplantılarınıza veya şehir merkezine konforlu, güvenli ve zamanında ulaşmanızı sağlıyoruz. Şoförlerimiz profesyonel, araçlarımız ise son model ve donanımlıdır.
Services.p2: Paris'in tarihi ve romantik atmosferini keşfetmek ister misiniz? Eyfel Kulesi, Louvre Müzesi, Notre-Dame Katedrali ve daha fazlasını profesyonel rehber eşliğinde ve konforlu araçlarımızla gezebilirsiniz. Paris turlarımız, özel rota ve kişiselleştirilmiş deneyim sunar.
Services.p3: İş gezilerinizde veya özel günlerinizde Paris'te VIP araç kiralama ve özel şoför hizmeti ile konforlu yolculuk yapabilirsiniz. Saatlik veya günlük seçeneklerle hizmet veren şoförlü araçlarımız, şehir içi ulaşımınızı stressiz ve prestijli hâle getirir.
Services.p4: Ailenizle birlikte Disneyland Paris'e gitmeyi mi planlıyorsunuz? Konforlu, güvenli ve çocuk dostu araçlarımızla Paris şehir merkezinden Disneyland'a direkt ulaşım sağlıyoruz. Tatil keyfinize keyif katmak için bizi tercih edin!

OurVehicles.title: Our Vehicles
OurVehicles.description: For your comfortable and safe journeys, our vehicles are customized according to the number of our guests and the number of luggage.

vehicle1.name: Tesla Model Y
vehicle1.description: Combining luxury and comfort, the Mercedes-Benz Classe E stands out with its stylish design and superior performance.

vehicle2.name: Mercedes-Benz Classe V
vehicle2.description: With its spacious interior and high comfort, the Mercedes-Benz Classe V is the ideal choice for group transfers.

vehicle3.name: Mercedes-Benz Classe S
vehicle3.description: The ultra-luxurious Mercedes-Benz Classe S offers the highest level of comfort and prestige.

feature1.title: Comfortable and Safe Transfer
feature1.description1: We offer a comfortable travel experience with the latest model, comfortable and air-conditioned vehicles.
feature1.description2: You can have a safe journey with our professional and experienced drivers.

feature2.title: Paris Airport Transfer Service
feature2.description1: Direct transfer from Charles de Gaulle (CDG), Orly (ORY) and Beauvais (BVA) airports to the city center and your hotel.
feature2.description2: Flexible welcome and waiting time according to your plane's landing time.

feature3.title: Private Chauffeured Tours
feature3.description1: Private chauffeured VIP tours to discover iconic Parisian landmarks.
feature3.description2: Special routes to the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Champs-Elysées and other touristic spots.

feature4.title: On-time and Uninterrupted Transportation
feature4.description1: Your driver will be waiting for you at the scheduled time, you can hit the road without wasting any time.
feature4.description2: The fastest and most suitable routes are determined according to traffic density.

feature5.title: Fixed and Transparent Price Policy
feature5.description1: Clear pricing at the time of booking, without any surprise additional fees.
feature5.description2: All prices are determined in advance, you will not encounter any extra payments at the end of the trip.

feature6.title: 24/7 Customer Support
feature6.description1: We offer support in Turkish, French and English whenever you need it.
feature6.description2: You can easily contact us for reservation changes or emergencies.

feature7.title: Group and Private Transfer Options
feature7.description1: Suitable vehicle alternatives for single persons, families or large groups.
feature7.description2: VIP transfer, luxury vehicle options and special transportation services for special events.

ParisAirportTransfer.title: Paris Airport Transfer Services
ParisAirportTransfer.description: We offer a luxurious, comfortable and professional airport transfer service in Paris. Reach your hotel or desired address safely from the airport with our chauffeur-driven vehicles.

cdg.name: Charles de Gaulle Airport Transfer (CDG)
cdg.description: The largest airport in Paris, approximately 30 km from the city center. We provide direct access to popular destinations such as Disneyland, the Champs-Élysées and the Eiffel Tower.

ory.name: Orly Airport Transfer (ORY)
ory.description: Comfortable transfer from the airport located in the south of Paris to the city center and touristic spots such as the Palace of Versailles.

bva.name: Beauvais Airport Transfer (BVA)
bva.description: We offer the fastest and most comfortable solutions for transportation from Beauvais airport, which is 87 km away from Paris city center.

Testimonials.title: Guest Comments
Testimonials.testimonial1: The service quality is truly amazing! I highly recommend it.
Testimonials.testimonial2: It was the best experience in Paris! Thank you.
Testimonials.testimonial3: Very professional and efficient service, highly recommended!
Testimonials.testimonial4: Everything was perfect, I will definitely choose them again.
Testimonials.testimonial5: It wasn't just a service, it was an experience. They understood us and guided us according to our needs.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question1: How can I make a reservation?
FAQ.answer1: You can get instant information and make a reservation via whatsapp application on our website.
FAQ.answer2: You can cancel your reservation free of charge up to 24 hours in advance.
FAQ.answer3: You can make the payment at the time of the service.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: As Paris Yolcusu, we provide comfortable and reliable transportation services in Paris with over 10 years of experience and a friendly team. From airport transfers to city tours, we offer customized solutions with our luxury vehicles.

feature1.title: VIP Transfer Services
feature1.description: We offer luxurious and comfortable transfers, including airport, hotel, and private transportation.

feature2.title: Private Chauffeur Services
feature2.description: Travel safely and comfortably in Paris with our experienced and professional drivers.

feature3.title: City Tours
feature3.description: Discover the historical and tourist attractions of Paris with our exclusive tours.

feature4.title: 24/7 Service
feature4.description: We are here for you at all times! We provide solutions for your transportation needs around the clock.

feature5.title: Affordable and Flexible Booking
feature5.description: Take advantage of our competitive pricing and flexible cancellation options by booking in advance.

CallToAction.title: Comfortable and Reliable Transfer Service in Paris!
CallToAction.description: With our luxury vehicles and professional chauffeurs, we safely take you to your destination in Paris. Contact us now for VIP airport transfers, hotel transfers, and private city tours!

CleanCar.title: Control and Cleaning Phase of Our Transfer Vehicles
CleanCar.p1: Vehicle structure that reduces air flow between driver and passenger to zero
CleanCar.p3: Air filters cleaned at regular intervals
CleanCar.p6: Professional driver and personnel tracking system

NotFound404.title: This page does not exist
NotFound404.span: Sorry, we could not find the page you were looking for.

ThankYou.title: Thank You
ThankYou.message: We will contact you as soon as possible via WhatsApp to confirm your reservation.
ThankYou.emailSent: Information has been sent to your email.

CDGairport.title: Charles de Gaulle Airport Transfer (CDG)
CDGairport.description1: Paris' largest and busiest airport, Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG), is approximately 25 km from the city center. We offer a private airport transfer service to get you from CDG Airport to your hotel, business meeting or tourist destination quickly and comfortably.

BVAairport.title: Beauvais Havalimanı Transfer (BVA)
BVAairport.description1: Beauvais Havalimanı'ndan Charles de Gaulle Havalimanı'na ulaşım için otobüs, tren ve özel transfer hizmetleri mevcuttur.
BVAairport.description2: BVA Havalimanı'ndan Paris şehir merkezine en hızlı ulaşım seçeneği özel transfer hizmetimizdir.

ORLYairport.title: Orly Airport Transfer (ORY)
ORLYairport.description1: Comfortable transfer from the airport located in the south of Paris to the city center and touristic spots such as the Palace of Versailles.
ORLYairport.description2: How to get from Orly Airport to Paris city center? Transfer options include private car, taxi, tram and bus.
ORLYairport.description3: We offer a direct transfer service from Orly Airport to Disneyland Paris.

HeroSection.title: Paris Sightseeing Tours
HeroSection.description: Discover the most beautiful places of Paris with our private chauffeur and professional guides. We are waiting for you for a comfortable and unforgettable experience.

eiffel.title: Eiffel Tower
eiffel.description: Visit the Eiffel Tower, the symbol of Paris, and enjoy the magnificent view.

louvre.title: Louvre Museum
louvre.description: See the most valuable works of art at the Louvre, one of the world's largest museums.

notreDame.title: Notre-Dame Cathedral
notreDame.description: Visit Notre-Dame, one of the most beautiful examples of Gothic architecture.

versailles.title: Versailles Palace
versailles.description: Discover the most magnificent palace in France and its magnificent gardens.

privateDriver.title: Private Chauffeur Service
privateDriver.description: A comfortable travel experience with our experienced and professional chauffeurs.

professionalGuide.title: Professional Guide
professionalGuide.description: Discover all the beauties of Paris with our expert guides.

customRoutes.title: Customized Routes
customRoutes.description: An unforgettable experience with customized travel routes.

hotelTransfer.title: Hotel Transfer Service
hotelTransfer.description: A service where you are picked up from your hotel and dropped back to your hotel after your travels.

BotProtection.description: Please answer the question below and complete the verification to access our site.
BotProtection.question: What is the capital of France?

validation.answerIncorrect: Incorrect answer. The capital of France is Paris.
